00046 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define PTC_INCREASE_VALUE    ((DESC_CLOCK_FREQUENCY / 100) * (DESC_FRAME_INTERVAL / 100))
00048 #define SCR_INCREASE_VALUE    (DESC_CLOCK_FREQUENCY / 1000)
00049 #define SOF_FRAME_END         (DESC_FRAME_INTERVAL  / 10000)
00050 #define PAYLOAD_HEADER_LEN    12
00051

00084 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 __ALIGN4 vu8 gInputDataBuffer[_EP4LEN] = {0xFF};
00086 static vu8 TransferTemp;
00087 
00088 static u8   UVC_bDevicePowerMode   = 0xA0;          /* Power Mode                                           */
00089 static vu8  UVC_bRequestErrorCode  = NO_ERROR;      /* Error Code                                           */
00090 
00091 static u32 UVC_wBrightnessCur     = 0x0037;         /* ProcessingUnit Brightness Current                    */
00092 static u32 UVC_wBrightnessDef     = 0xFFDF;         /* ProcessingUnit Brightness Default                    */
00093 static u32 UVC_wBrightnessMin     = 0x0082;         /* ProcessingUnit Brightness Minimum                    */
00094 static u32 UVC_wBrightnessMax     = 0x007e;         /* ProcessingUnit Brightness Maximum                    */
00095 static u32 UVC_wBrightnessRes     = 0x0001;         /* ProcessingUnit Brightness Resolution                 */
00096 
00097 static vu8  UVC_wBrightnessCur_temp     = 0x00;     /* SelectorUnit temp selected input pin                 */
00098 
00099 static vu8 SET_INTERFACE_Flag = 0;
00100 static vu8 EP4_Flag = 0;
00101 static vu32 EP4_Return_Len;
00102 static vu32 SOF_Count = 0;
00103 static vu32 Img_Tranfer_Count = 0;
00104 static vu8 Frame_End = 0;
00105 static vu8 IMAGE_Y = 0 ,IMAGE_U = 0x80 ,IMAGE_V = 0x80;
00106 
00107 __ALIGN4 static UVC_VIDEO_PROBE_AND_COMMIT_CONTROL UVC_vsVideoProbe =
00108 {
00109   0x0000,                 // bitfield indicating what fields shall be kept fixed
00110   0x01,                   // Video format index from a format descriptor
00111   0x01,                   // Video frame index from a frame descriptor
00112   DESC_FRAME_INTERVAL,    // Frame interval in 100 ns units
00113   0x0000,                 // Key frame rate in key-frame per video-frame units
00114   0x0000,                 // PFrame rate i PFrame/key frame units
00115   0x0000,                 // Compression quality control in abstract units (0..10000)
00116   0x0000,                 // Window size for average bit rate control
00117   0x0000,                 // int. VS interface latency in ms from capture to presentation
00118   DESC_FRAME_BUF_SIZE,    // maximum video frame or codec specific segment size in bytes
00119   (u32)_EP4LEN,           // max. bytes the device can transmit/receive in single payload transfer
00120 #if (UVC_VERSION ==  0x0110)
00121   0x00000000,             // device clock frequency in Hz for specified format
00122   0x00,                   // bitfield control
00123   0x00,                   // preferred payload format version for specified bFormatIndex
00124   0x00,                   // minimum payload format version for specified bFormatIndex
00125   0x00                    // maximum payload format version for specified bFormatIndex
00126 #endif
00127 };

00130 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00131   * @brief  USB Class initialization.
00132   * @param  pClass: pointer of USBDCore_Class_TypeDef
00133   * @retval None
00134   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00135 void USBDClass_Init(USBDCore_Class_TypeDef *pClass)
00136 {
00137   pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.func = USBDClass_MainRoutine;
00138   //pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00139 
00140   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.func = USBDClass_Reset;
00141   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00142 
00143   pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.func = USBDClass_StartOfFrame;
00144   pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00145 
00146 
00147   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor = USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor;
00148   pClass->CallBack_ClassSetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface;
00149   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_GetInterface;
00150 
00151   pClass->CallBack_ClassRequest = USBDClass_Request;
00152   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[1] = USBDClass_Endpoint1;
00153   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[2] = USBDClass_Endpoint2;
00154   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[3] = USBDClass_Endpoint3;
00155   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[4] = USBDClass_Endpoint4;
00156   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[5] = USBDClass_Endpoint5;
00157   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[6] = USBDClass_Endpoint6;
00158   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[7] = USBDClass_Endpoint7;
00159 
00160   return;
00161 }
00162 
00163 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00164 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00165   * @brief  USB Class main routine.
00166   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class main routine
00167   * @retval None
00168   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00169 static void USBDClass_MainRoutine(u32 uPara)
00170 {
00171   //USBDClass_EPT4InProcess();
00172   u32 i;
00173   if (Frame_End)
00174   {
00175     for (i = 0; i < (_EP4LEN-12) / 4; i++)
00176     {
00177       gInputDataBuffer[12 + i * 4] = IMAGE_Y;
00178       gInputDataBuffer[12 + i * 4 + 1] = IMAGE_U;
00179       gInputDataBuffer[12 + i * 4 + 2] = IMAGE_Y;
00180       gInputDataBuffer[12 + i * 4 + 3] = IMAGE_V;
00181     }
00182     Frame_End = 0;
00183     IMAGE_Y += 0x10;
00184     if (IMAGE_Y >= 0xF0)
00185     {
00186       IMAGE_Y = 0x10;
00187       IMAGE_U += 0x10;
00188       if (IMAGE_U >= 0xF0)
00189       {
00190         IMAGE_U = 0x80;
00191         IMAGE_V += 0x10;
00192         if (IMAGE_V >= 0xF0)
00193           IMAGE_V = 0x80;
00194       }
00195     }
00196   }
00197 
00198   return;
00199 }
00200 
00201 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00202   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint 4 In Process for application.
00203   * @retval None
00204   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00205 static void USBDClass_EPT4InProcess(void)
00206 {
00207   u32 temp, temp_transfer;
00208   u32 TempCount;
00209   //u32 *ptr;
00210   if (EP4_Flag)
00211   {
00212     u8 tempBuffer[4];
00213     tempBuffer[0] = gInputDataBuffer[6];
00214     tempBuffer[1] = gInputDataBuffer[7];
00215     tempBuffer[2] = gInputDataBuffer[8];
00216     tempBuffer[3] = gInputDataBuffer[9];
00217     temp = (tempBuffer[3] << 24) | (tempBuffer[2] << 16) | (tempBuffer[1] << 8) | tempBuffer[0];
00218     //ptr = (u32 *)(&gInputDataBuffer[6]);
00219     //temp = *ptr;
00220     temp += SCR_INCREASE_VALUE;
00221     gInputDataBuffer[6] = temp;
00222     gInputDataBuffer[7] = temp >> 8;
00223     gInputDataBuffer[8] = temp >> 16;
00224     gInputDataBuffer[9] = temp >> 24;
00225 
00226     if (SOF_Count < (SOF_FRAME_END + 1))
00227     {
00228       if (Img_Tranfer_Count < DESC_FRAME_BUF_SIZE)
00229       {
00230         temp_transfer = (DESC_FRAME_BUF_SIZE-Img_Tranfer_Count);
00231         if (temp_transfer > _EP4LEN)
00232         {
00233           EP4_Return_Len = USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT4, (u32 *)gInputDataBuffer,_EP4LEN);
00234           TempCount = (EP4_Return_Len-PAYLOAD_HEADER_LEN);
00235           Img_Tranfer_Count += TempCount;
00236         }
00237         else
00238         {
00239           switch (gInputDataBuffer[1])
00240           {
00241             case 0x8C:
00242               gInputDataBuffer[1] = 0x8E;
00243               EP4_Return_Len = USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT4, (u32 *)gInputDataBuffer, temp_transfer + PAYLOAD_HEADER_LEN);
00244               gInputDataBuffer[1] = 0x8C;
00245               break;
00246             case 0x8D:
00247               gInputDataBuffer[1] = 0x8F;
00248               EP4_Return_Len = USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT4, (u32 *)gInputDataBuffer, temp_transfer + PAYLOAD_HEADER_LEN);
00249               gInputDataBuffer[1] = 0x8D;
00250               break;
00251             default:
00252               gInputDataBuffer[1] = 0x8C;
00253               break;
00254           }
00255           TempCount = (EP4_Return_Len-PAYLOAD_HEADER_LEN);
00256           Img_Tranfer_Count += TempCount;
00257         }
00258       }
00259       else
00260       {
00261         USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT4, (u32 *)gInputDataBuffer, PAYLOAD_HEADER_LEN);
00262       }
00263     }
00264     else
00265     {
00266       Frame_End = 1;
00267       Img_Tranfer_Count = 0;
00268       switch (gInputDataBuffer[1])
00269       {
00270         case 0x8C:
00271           gInputDataBuffer[1] = 0x8D;
00272           break;
00273         case 0x8D:
00274           gInputDataBuffer[1] = 0x8C;
00275           break;
00276         default:
00277           gInputDataBuffer[1] = 0x8C;
00278           break;
00279       }
00280       USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT4, (u32 *)gInputDataBuffer, PAYLOAD_HEADER_LEN);
00281     }
00282     EP4_Flag = 0;
00283   }
00284   else
00285   {
00286   }
00287   return;
00288 }

00304 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00305   * @brief  USB Class Start of Frame.
00306   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class Start of Frame.
00307   * @retval None
00308   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00309 static void USBDClass_StartOfFrame(u32 uPara)
00310 {
00311   u16 temp;
00312   u32 temp_long;
00313   //u32 *ptr;
00314 
00315   if (SET_INTERFACE_Flag)
00316     SOF_Count++;
00317 
00318   temp = (gInputDataBuffer[11] << 8 );
00319   temp |= gInputDataBuffer[10];
00320   temp++;
00321   temp &= 0x07FF;
00322   gInputDataBuffer[10] = temp;
00323   gInputDataBuffer[11] = temp >> 8;
00324 
00325   if (SOF_Count > (SOF_FRAME_END + 1))
00326   {
00327     SOF_Count = 0;
00328   }
00329   else if (SOF_Count == SOF_FRAME_END)
00330   {
00331     u8 tempBuffer[4];
00332     tempBuffer[0] = gInputDataBuffer[2];
00333     tempBuffer[1] = gInputDataBuffer[3];
00334     tempBuffer[2] = gInputDataBuffer[4];
00335     tempBuffer[3] = gInputDataBuffer[5];
00336 
00337     temp_long = (tempBuffer[3] << 24) | (tempBuffer[2] << 16) | (tempBuffer[1] << 8) | tempBuffer[0];
00338     //ptr = (u32 *)(&(gInputDataBuffer[2]));
00339     //temp_long = *ptr;
00340     temp_long += PTC_INCREASE_VALUE;
00341     gInputDataBuffer[2] = temp_long;
00342     gInputDataBuffer[3] = temp_long >> 8;
00343     gInputDataBuffer[4] = temp_long >> 16;
00344     gInputDataBuffer[5] = temp_long >> 24;
00345   }
00346   API_USB_CLR_SOF_INT();
00347   return;
00348 }
00349 
00350 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00351   * @brief  USB Device Class Request.
00352   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00353   * @retval None
00354   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00355 static void USBDClass_Request(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00356 {
00357   u8 USBCmd = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.bRequest)));
00358   u16 len = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wLength)));
00359 
00360   if (len == 0)
00361   {
00362     return;
00363   }
00364   switch (USBCmd)
00365   {
00366     case CLASS_REQ_01_SET_CUR:
00367       USBDClass_SET_CUR(pDev);
00368       break;
00369     case CLASS_REQ_81_GET_CUR:
00370       USBDClass_GET_CUR(pDev);
00371       break;
00372     case CLASS_REQ_82_GET_MIN:
00373       USBDClass_GET_MIN(pDev);
00374       break;
00375     case CLASS_REQ_83_GET_MAX:
00376       USBDClass_GET_MAX(pDev);
00377       break;
00378     case CLASS_REQ_84_GET_RES:
00379       USBDClass_GET_RES(pDev);
00380       break;
00381     case CLASS_REQ_85_GET_LEN:
00382       USBDClass_GET_LEN(pDev);
00383       break;
00384     case CLASS_REQ_86_GET_INFO:
00385       USBDClass_GET_INFO(pDev);
00386       break;
00387     case CLASS_REQ_87_GET_DEF:
00388       USBDClass_GET_DEF(pDev);
00389       break;
00390 
00391     // others not support
00392     default:
00393       break;
00394   }
00395   return;
00396 }

00398 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00399   * @brief  USB Device Class Standard Request - SET_INTERFACE.
00400   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00401   * @retval None
00402   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00403 static void USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00404 {
00405   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 0;
00406   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00407 }

00423 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00424   * @brief  Set_Brightness_Control.
00425   * @param  value: Parameter for Class Reset.
00426   * @retval None
00427   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00428 static void Set_Brightness_Control(u32 value)
00429 {
00430   if ((UVC_wBrightnessCur_temp >= UVC_wBrightnessMin) && (UVC_wBrightnessCur_temp <= UVC_wBrightnessMax))
00431   {
00432     UVC_wBrightnessCur = UVC_wBrightnessCur_temp;
00433     UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00434   }
00435   else
00436     UVC_bRequestErrorCode = OUT_OF_RANGE;
00437 }
00438 
00439 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00440   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Set CUR Request.
00441   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00442   * @retval None
00443   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00444 static void USBDClass_SET_CUR(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00445 {
00446   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00447   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00448   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00449   {
00450     case VC_INTERFACE_NUM:                      //VideoControl Interface
00451       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00452       {
00453         case CONTROL_ID:
00454           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00455           {
00456             case VC_VIDEO_POWER_MODE_CONTROL:   //Set Power Mode Control
00457               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_bDevicePowerMode;
00458               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00459               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00460 
00461               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00462               break;
00463             default:
00464               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00465               break;
00466           }
00467           break;
00468         case IT_ID:
00469           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00470           {
00471             default:
00472               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00473               break;
00474           }
00475           break;
00476         case OT_ID:
00477           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00478           {
00479             default:
00480               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00481               break;
00482           }
00483           break;
00484         case PU_ID:
00485           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00486           {
00487             case PU_BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL:
00488               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_wBrightnessCur_temp;
00489               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00490               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00491 
00492               pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func = Set_Brightness_Control;
00493               pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.uPara = 0;
00494 
00495               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00496               break;
00497             default:
00498               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00499               break;
00500           }
00501           break;
00502         default:
00503           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_UNIT;
00504           break;
00505       }
00506       break;
00507     case VS_INTERFACE_NUM:  //VideoStreaming Interface
00508       switch (USBValueH)
00509       {               // select the  selector control
00510         case VS_PROBE_CONTROL :
00511         case VS_COMMIT_CONTROL:
00512           pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_vsVideoProbe;
00513           pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = sizeof(UVC_VIDEO_PROBE_AND_COMMIT_CONTROL);
00514           pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00515 
00516           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00517           break;
00518         default:
00519           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00520           break;
00521       }
00522       break;
00523 
00524     // others not support
00525     default:
00526       UVC_bRequestErrorCode = UNKNOWN;
00527       break;
00528   }
00529 }
00530 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00531   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Get CUR Request.
00532   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00533   * @retval None
00534   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00535 static void USBDClass_GET_CUR(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00536 {
00537   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00538   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00539   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00540   {
00541     case VC_INTERFACE_NUM:                      //VideoControl Interface
00542       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00543       {
00544         case CONTROL_ID:
00545           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00546           {
00547             case VC_VIDEO_POWER_MODE_CONTROL:   //Set Power Mode Control
00548               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_bDevicePowerMode;
00549               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00550               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00551 
00552               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00553               break;
00554             default:
00555               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00556               break;
00557           }
00558           break;
00559         case IT_ID:
00560           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00561           {
00562             default:
00563               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00564               break;
00565           }
00566           break;
00567         case OT_ID:
00568           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00569           {
00570             default:
00571               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00572               break;
00573           }
00574           break;
00575         case PU_ID:
00576           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00577           {
00578             case PU_BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL:
00579               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_wBrightnessCur;
00580               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00581               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00582 
00583               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00584               break;
00585             default:
00586               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00587               break;
00588           }
00589           break;
00590         default:
00591           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_UNIT;
00592           break;
00593       }
00594       break;
00595     case VS_INTERFACE_NUM:  //VideoStreaming Interface
00596       switch (USBValueH)
00597       {               // select the  selector control
00598         case VS_PROBE_CONTROL :
00599         case VS_COMMIT_CONTROL:
00600           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wKeyFrameRate = 0;
00601           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wPFrameRate = 0;
00602           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wCompQuality = 0;
00603           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wCompWindowSize = 0;
00604           UVC_vsVideoProbe.dwMaxPayloadTransferSize = _EP4LEN;//0x01F4;//0x0C00;
00605           pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_vsVideoProbe;
00606           pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = sizeof(UVC_VIDEO_PROBE_AND_COMMIT_CONTROL);
00607           pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00608 
00609           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00610           break;
00611         default:
00612           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00613           break;
00614       }
00615       break;
00616 
00617     // others not support
00618     default:
00619       UVC_bRequestErrorCode = UNKNOWN;
00620       break;
00621   }
00622 }
00623 
00624 
00625 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00626   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET MIN Request.
00627   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00628   * @retval None
00629   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00630 static void USBDClass_GET_MIN(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00631 {
00632   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00633   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00634   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00635   {
00636     case VC_INTERFACE_NUM:                      //VideoControl Interface
00637       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00638       {
00639         case IT_ID:
00640           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00641           {
00642             default:
00643               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00644               break;
00645           }
00646           break;
00647         case OT_ID:
00648           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00649           {
00650             default:
00651               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00652               break;
00653           }
00654           break;
00655         case PU_ID:
00656           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00657           {
00658             case PU_BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL:
00659               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_wBrightnessMin;
00660               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00661               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00662 
00663               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00664               break;
00665             default:
00666               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00667               break;
00668           }
00669           break;
00670         default:
00671           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_UNIT;
00672           break;
00673       }
00674       break;
00675     case VS_INTERFACE_NUM:  //VideoStreaming Interface
00676       switch (USBValueH)
00677       {               // select the  selector control
00678         case VS_PROBE_CONTROL:
00679           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wKeyFrameRate = 0;
00680           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wPFrameRate = 0;
00681           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wCompQuality = 0;
00682           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wCompWindowSize = 0;
00683           pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_vsVideoProbe;
00684           pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00685           pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00686 
00687           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00688           break;
00689         default:
00690           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00691           break;
00692       }
00693       break;
00694 
00695     // others not support
00696     default:
00697       UVC_bRequestErrorCode = UNKNOWN;
00698       break;
00699   }
00700 }
00701 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00702   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Get MAX Request.
00703   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00704   * @retval None
00705   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00706 static void USBDClass_GET_MAX(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00707 {
00708   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00709   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00710   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00711   {
00712     case VC_INTERFACE_NUM:                      //VideoControl Interface
00713       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00714       {
00715         case IT_ID:
00716           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00717           {
00718             default:
00719               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00720               break;
00721           }
00722           break;
00723         case OT_ID:
00724           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00725           {
00726             default:
00727               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00728               break;
00729           }
00730           break;
00731         case PU_ID:
00732           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00733           {
00734             case PU_BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL:
00735               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_wBrightnessMax;
00736               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00737               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00738 
00739               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00740               break;
00741             default:
00742               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00743               break;
00744           }
00745           break;
00746         default:
00747           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_UNIT;
00748           break;
00749       }
00750       break;
00751     case VS_INTERFACE_NUM:  //VideoStreaming Interface
00752       switch (USBValueH)
00753       {               // select the  selector control
00754         case VS_PROBE_CONTROL:
00755           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wKeyFrameRate = 0;
00756           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wPFrameRate = 0;
00757           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wCompQuality = 0;
00758           UVC_vsVideoProbe.wCompWindowSize = 0;
00759           pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_vsVideoProbe;
00760           pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00761           pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00762 
00763           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00764           break;
00765         default:
00766           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00767           break;
00768       }
00769       break;
00770 
00771     // others not support
00772     default:
00773       UVC_bRequestErrorCode = UNKNOWN;
00774       break;
00775   }
00776 }
00777 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00778   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET RES Request.
00779   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00780   * @retval None
00781   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00782 static void USBDClass_GET_RES(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00783 {
00784   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00785   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00786   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00787   {
00788     case VC_INTERFACE_NUM:                      //VideoControl Interface
00789       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00790       {
00791         case IT_ID:
00792           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00793           {
00794             default:
00795               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00796               break;
00797           }
00798           break;
00799         case OT_ID:
00800           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00801           {
00802             default:
00803               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00804               break;
00805           }
00806           break;
00807         case PU_ID:
00808           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00809           {
00810             case PU_BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL:
00811               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_wBrightnessRes; //must be 1
00812               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00813               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00814 
00815               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00816               break;
00817             default:
00818               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00819               break;
00820           }
00821           break;
00822         default:
00823           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_UNIT;
00824           break;
00825       }
00826       break;
00827     case VS_INTERFACE_NUM:  //VideoStreaming Interface
00828       switch (USBValueH)
00829       {               // select the  selector control
00830         default:
00831           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00832           break;
00833       }
00834       break;
00835 
00836     // others not support
00837     default:
00838       UVC_bRequestErrorCode = UNKNOWN;
00839       break;
00840   }
00841 }
00842 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00843   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET LEN Request.
00844   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00845   * @retval None
00846   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00847 static void USBDClass_GET_LEN(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00848 {
00849   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00850   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00851   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00852   {
00853     case VC_INTERFACE_NUM:                      //VideoControl Interface
00854       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00855       {
00856         case PU_ID:
00857           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00858           {
00859             case PU_BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL:
00860               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_REQUEST;
00861               break;
00862             default:
00863               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00864               break;
00865           }
00866           break;
00867         default:
00868           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_UNIT;
00869           break;
00870       }
00871       break;
00872     case VS_INTERFACE_NUM:  //VideoStreaming Interface
00873       switch (USBValueH)
00874       {               // select the  selector control
00875         default:
00876           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00877           break;
00878       }
00879       break;
00880 
00881     // others not support
00882     default:
00883       UVC_bRequestErrorCode = UNKNOWN;
00884       break;
00885   }
00886 }
00887 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00888   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET INFO Request.
00889   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00890   * @retval None
00891   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00892 static void USBDClass_GET_INFO(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00893 {
00894   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00895   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00896   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00897   {
00898     case VC_INTERFACE_NUM:                      //VideoControl Interface
00899       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00900       {
00901         case CONTROL_ID:
00902           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00903           {
00904             case VC_VIDEO_POWER_MODE_CONTROL:   //Set Power Mode Control
00905               TransferTemp = (SUPPORTS_GET | SUPPORTS_SET);
00906               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&TransferTemp;
00907               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00908               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00909 
00910               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00911               break;
00912             case VC_REQUEST_ERROR_CODE_CONTROL:
00913               TransferTemp = (SUPPORTS_GET);
00914               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&TransferTemp;
00915               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00916               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00917 
00918               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00919               break;
00920             default:
00921               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00922               break;
00923           }
00924           break;
00925         case IT_ID:
00926           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00927           {
00928             default:
00929               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00930               break;
00931           }
00932           break;
00933         case OT_ID:
00934           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00935           {
00936             default:
00937               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00938               break;
00939           }
00940           break;
00941         case PU_ID:
00942           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00943           {
00944             case PU_BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL:
00945               TransferTemp = (SUPPORTS_GET | SUPPORTS_SET);
00946               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&TransferTemp;
00947               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00948               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00949 
00950               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
00951               break;
00952             default:
00953               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00954               break;
00955           }
00956           break;
00957         default:
00958           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_UNIT;
00959           break;
00960       }
00961       break;
00962     case VS_INTERFACE_NUM:  //VideoStreaming Interface
00963       switch (USBValueH)
00964       {
00965         default:
00966           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00967           break;
00968       }
00969       break;
00970 
00971     // others not support
00972     default:
00973       UVC_bRequestErrorCode = UNKNOWN;
00974       break;
00975   }
00976 }
00977 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00978   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET DEF Request.
00979   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00980   * @retval None
00981   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00982 static void USBDClass_GET_DEF(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00983 {
00984   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00985   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00986   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00987   {
00988     case VC_INTERFACE_NUM:                      //VideoControl Interface
00989       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00990       {
00991         case IT_ID:
00992           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
00993           {
00994             default:
00995               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
00996               break;
00997           }
00998           break;
00999         case OT_ID:
01000           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
01001           {
01002             default:
01003               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
01004               break;
01005           }
01006           break;
01007         case PU_ID:
01008           switch (USBValueH)                    //switch request control
01009           {
01010             case PU_BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL:
01011               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UVC_wBrightnessDef;
01012               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
01013               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
01014 
01015               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = NO_ERROR;
01016               break;
01017             default:
01018               UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
01019               break;
01020           }
01021           break;
01022         default:
01023           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_UNIT;
01024           break;
01025       }
01026       break;
01027     case VS_INTERFACE_NUM:  //VideoStreaming Interface
01028       switch (USBValueH)
01029       {
01030         default:
01031           UVC_bRequestErrorCode = INVALID_CONTROL;
01032           break;
01033       }
01034       break;
01035 
01036     // others not support
01037     default:
01038       UVC_bRequestErrorCode = UNKNOWN;
01039       break;
01040   }
01041 }
